meanings.sent1: Her ascendant position at work allowed her to make important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The company's ascendant growth in the market impressed investors.
meanings.sent3: His ascendant popularity among his peers made him the go-to person for advice.
meanings.sent4: The team's ascendant performance on the field secured their victory.
meanings.sent5: The sun's ascendant rays illuminated the entire room.

meanings.sent1: My ascendant was a brave warrior who fought in battles.
meanings.sent2: Learning about my ascendant's life helped me understand my family history.
meanings.sent3: I like to imagine my ascendant cheering me on from the afterlife.
meanings.sent4: The values passed down by my ascendant guide me in making decisions.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the grave of my ascendant always fills me with respect and gratitude.

meanings.definition: The position of a celestial body above the horizon.
meanings.sent1: The moon's ascendant in the night sky signaled the start of the lunar cycle.
meanings.sent2: Stargazers eagerly awaited the ascendant of the comet for a rare celestial event.
meanings.sent3: The ascendant of the planets created a beautiful alignment in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The ascendant of the sun at dawn painted the clouds with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the ascendant of a shooting star brought a sense of wonder and awe.
